mapper.insert: insert into board (user_email, subject, content, hit, register_time) values (#{userEmail}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.select: select b.article_no, b.user_email, u.user_name, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time from board b join users u on b.user_email = u.user_email where article_no = #{articleNo}
